alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Weber and eastern Box Elder Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 730 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ogden, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogden, North Ogden, Marriott-Slaterville, South Willard, West Haven, Pleasant View, Farr West, Harrisville, Liberty, Snowbasin, Slaterville and Eden. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 347 and 353. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
